pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paṭṭo hoti cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.3: So paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ karitvā surattaṃ suparikammakataṃ katvā pārupi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.4: Atha kho aññataro paribbājako mahagghaṃ paṭaṃ pārupitvā yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.10: Atha kho so paribbājako taṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.17: Atha kho so paribbājako—“saccaṃ kho paribbājakā āhaṃsu—‘katihipi myāyaṃ saṅghāṭi bhavissati. Soyeva me paṭo varo’”ti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.18: yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.19: “handa te, āvuso, saṅghāṭi; dehi me paṭan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.22: Atha kho so paribbājako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.24: kiṃ pana pabbajito pabbajitassa na dassatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.25: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa paribbājakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.26: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.27: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.28: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.29: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, paribbājakena saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.32: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, paribbājakena saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.34: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:1.35: “Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:2.8: iminā imaṃ dehi, iminā imaṃ āhara, iminā imaṃ parivattehi, iminā imaṃ cetāpehīti. Ajjhācarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:2.9: Yato kayitañca hoti vikkayitañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ, nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:2.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:2.28: “idaṃ amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti bhaṇati,
